item.title: EAA Rescaled v1.5 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 20, 2025

EAA Rescaled v1.5 1.55 ETS2

Update: 1.5
– Fixed def issue
– Updated to the latest version of EAA
– Fixed many bugs
– Rescaled more cities in northern Brazil

Description:
This mod rescales and moves EAA to the right spot on the background and fixes many issues that EAA had when being combined with other maps – Please note that several parts of Brazil have not been moved due to the amount of time it would take and how difficult it would be to move, the rest may be added in future versions

Load order
EAA Rescaled
EAA Map Semeuropa
EAA Base
EAA Base Share

If you’re using this is in a map combo put EAA at the very bottom of your load order

Credits: SaltySeeds06

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: 2023 Volkswagen Golf R8 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 19, 2025

2023 Volkswagen Golf R8 v1.0 ETS2

It seems there might be a slight confusion in the model name. While Volkswagen produces the high-performance Golf R, the “R8” designation is famously associated with the Audi R8, a completely different, mid-engine supercar.

It’s highly likely you’re interested in the 2023 Volkswagen Golf R. Let’s break down what that car offers, and briefly touch on the Audi R8 for clarity.

2023 Volkswagen Golf R: The Ultimate Hot Hatch
The 2023 Volkswagen Golf R is the top-tier performance version of the Golf hatchback. It’s known for its blend of everyday usability and serious performance, making it a “sleeper” in the hot hatch segment.

Key Features:
Engine: It’s powered by a potent 2.0-liter turbocharged four-cylinder (EA888 TSI®) engine. For 2023, this engine produces 315 horsepower and up to 295 lb-ft of torque.
Transmission: You have a choice between a six-speed manual transmission or a seven-speed DSG® (dual-clutch automatic) transmission. The DSG generally offers quicker acceleration.
Drivetrain: Power is sent to all four wheels via Volkswagen’s advanced 4MOTION all-wheel-drive system with rear-axle torque vectoring. This system can distribute power dynamically between the rear wheels, greatly enhancing handling and grip, especially in corners.

Performance:
0-100 km/h (0-60 mph) in around 4.7 seconds (DSG can be as quick as 3.9 seconds).
Top speed is electronically limited to 250 km/h (155 mph), but an optional “R-Performance Package” can raise this to 270 km/h (168 mph).
Driving Modes: The Golf R offers various selectable drive modes, including Comfort, Sport, Race, Special (often for Nürburgring), Drift, and Individual. The “R” button on the steering wheel provides quick access to these modes.

Chassis and Handling:
Standard adaptive dampers (DCC®) allow you to adjust suspension stiffness.
Progressive variable-ratio steering provides precise and responsive handling.
Larger, more powerful brakes ensure strong stopping power.

Interior and Technology:
The interior features a driver-focused cockpit with a 10.25-inch Digital Cockpit Pro (digital instrument cluster) and a 10-inch MIB3 Discover Pro touchscreen infotainment system.
It includes a new operating system similar to VW’s electric models, touch-sensitive controls, and customizable ambient lighting with up to 30 colors.
Sport seats with integrated headrests and R-specific badging are standard.
Available features include a Harman/Kardon premium sound system and a head-up display.
Exterior Styling: The 2023 Golf R maintains its aggressive but understated look with unique R-specific bumpers, side skirts, quad exhaust tips, and distinctive 19-inch wheels.
20th Anniversary Edition: For 2023, Volkswagen also offered a limited 20th Anniversary Edition of the Golf R, celebrating two decades of high-performance Golf models. This version featured unique styling cues like blue “R” logos, gloss black 19-inch wheels, and carbon fiber interior trim.

Why the “R8” Confusion?
The Audi R8 is a completely different vehicle. It’s a mid-engine, two-seater sports car, known for its powerful naturally aspirated V10 engine. The 2023 Audi R8 could produce up to 602 horsepower (in its performance quattro trim) and was available in coupe and Spyder (convertible) forms. It was Audi’s flagship performance model and was discontinued after the 2023 model year.

So, while both are high-performance German cars, the Volkswagen Golf R is a practical, powerful hot hatchback, and the Audi R8 is an exotic, track-focused supercar.

If you were indeed thinking of the Volkswagen Golf R, I hope this information is helpful! Do you have any other questions about it?

Credits: gasp

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Caio millennium 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 19, 2025

Caio millennium 1.55 ETS2

You’re looking for a Caio Millennium bus mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) that is compatible with game version 1.55! This is a very popular request, as Caio Millennium buses are iconic in Brazil and well-loved by the ETS2 community.

The good news is that there are indeed Caio Millennium mods available for ETS2, and some have been updated to support newer versions like 1.55. You’ll most likely find versions of the Caio Millennium II PBC and the newer Caio Millennium V.

Key Information about Caio Millennium Mods
Models : The most common models you’ll find are the Caio Millennium II PBC (Piso Baixo Central), which was a very common urban bus in São Paulo and other Brazilian cities, and the Caio Millennium V, a more modern urban model.

Features: These mods often include:
Detailed 3D models: Both exterior and interior are usually well-replicated.
Various chassis options: Often supporting different Mercedes-Benz or Volvo chassis configurations, reflecting real-world bus variations.
Customization: Multiple skins (including real-world Brazilian bus companies), different wheel options, and interior accessories.
Unique sounds: Many high-quality bus mods come with realistic engine and transmission sounds.
Animations: Improved interior and exterior animations.
Passenger Mods : While the base game is for cargo, many bus mods are often paired with a separate passenger mod (like the “Mod de Passageiros” by Cristhian Cardoso) that allows you to pick up and drop off virtual passengers, adding to the realism of urban bus simulation.
Brazilian Modders: Many of the best Caio Millennium mods are created by Brazilian modders, who put a lot of effort into making them authentic. Look for names like Cristhian [BR] and Carlos Daniel on modding sites or the Steam Workshop.

Installation for `.scs` files:
1. Download the mod file (it will likely be a `.zip` or `.rar` archive containing one or more `.scs` files).
2. Extract the `.scs` file(s).
3. Copy these `.scs` files to your `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod` folder.
4. Launch ETS2.
5. From the profile selection screen, click on “Mod Manager.”
6. Find the Caio Millennium mod(s) in the left column and activate them by clicking the right arrow to move them to the active mods column.
7. Click “Confirm Changes.”
8. Load your game profile. You should be able to purchase the bus at a mod dealer in the game.

Credits: gasp

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Volvo FH5 30 yes Edition v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 19, 2025

Volvo FH5 30 yes Edition v1.0 ETS2

The Volvo FH 30 Year Edition is a special, limited-edition truck launched by Volvo Trucks to commemorate three decades since the introduction of the highly successful Volvo FH model in 1993. This anniversary edition highlights the FH’s legacy of innovation, comfort, and safety.

Key Features and Highlights
Exclusive Design: The 30 Year Edition typically features a distinctive metallic red paint scheme, often referred to as “Red Opaque” or similar, which is exclusive to this special series. It also incorporates unique graphic elements and badging to signify its limited-edition status. Many models come with black accents, such as a black piano finish on the grille, headlights, and fender details, adding to its luxurious and sporty appearance.
Enhanced Interior: The cabin is designed for premium comfort and exclusivity. Expect high-quality materials, bespoke upholstery with special stitching, and unique interior trim elements that set it apart from standard FH models.
Advanced Technology: These special editions often include the latest technological advancements from Volvo Trucks. This can include:
Camera-based mirrors: Replacing traditional side mirrors with cameras for improved visibility and reduced aerodynamic drag, contributing to fuel efficiency.
Next-generation I-See system: This predictive cruise control system uses real-time topography data and now anticipates curves and roundabouts to optimize gear changes and speed, further enhancing fuel economy.
Pilot Assist system: An advanced driver assistance system that can take control in emergencies, such as if the driver becomes incapacitated.
Lane recognition and alert systems: To enhance safety by warning the driver of deviations.
Tire pressure and temperature monitoring system: Provides real-time data to the driver and fleet managers.
Some editions also feature amenities like an in-cabin microwave.
Performance: The 30 Year Edition models are usually based on powerful configurations of the FH, such as the FH 500 (6×2) or FH 540 (6×4), offering strong performance for various transport operations. They come with Volvo’s renowned I-Shift automated gearbox.
Limited Production: These editions are produced in limited numbers, making them highly sought after by collectors and trucking enthusiasts. For example, in Brazil, only 60 units were made available (30 units of the FH 500 6×2 and 30 units of the FH 540 6×4). Argentina also received a special allocation, initially 30 units, with more added due to high demand.

Significance
The Volvo FH has been Volvo’s best-selling truck globally, with over 1.4 million units sold worldwide and over 200,000 units in Brazil since its launch in 1994. The 30 Year Edition celebrates this remarkable legacy, recognizing the truck’s continuous evolution in terms of electronics, safety, fuel efficiency, and driver comfort. It serves as a showcase for Volvo’s commitment to innovation in the heavy-duty transport sector.

This special edition was notably featured at events like Fenatran 2024 in Brazil, drawing significant attention from the industry. Many units were reportedly sold out even before the event officially opened, underscoring its appeal.

Would you like to know more about the specific features available in the Brazilian market for this edition, or perhaps its historical impact?

Credits: gasp

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
